txt.en:
'I am ready to help you learn how to become a more powerful Brawler. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you to unleash upon your foes.

'Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> against a Training Dummy.'

HINT:

Brawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb>or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
'Well done, [placeholder]!  As you grow as a [placeholder], you will find that there are much more powerful new skills available for you. Good luck!'

'Strike the training dummy with your new skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'

HINT:

Brawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb>or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
Intro: The Thrill of the Fight
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
Use your Overhand Smash skill on the Training Dummy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> on the training dummy nearby. \n\nBrawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb>or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
Talk to Otto Beecher, the Brawler Trainer in Archet
Otto Beecher, the Brawler Trainer, is in Archet, west of the training grounds.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your new skill, you should return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
